alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Drew (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 6:00PM CDT until March 26 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Bradley County in southeastern Arkansas... Southwestern Drew County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 559 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Strong, or 9 miles northwest of Huttig, moving northeast at 50 mph. This storm has a history of producing quarter sized hail, most recently in northern Union Parish in Louisiana. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Green Hill... Ingalls... Ladelle... Prairie Grove... New Hope in Drew County... Johnsonville... Vick... Valley... Mt Olive in Bradley County... Marsden... Sumpter... Lacey... Blanchton... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
